extendedInfo.description: VGBA is a GameBoy Advance emulator. It runs GBA games on your Android phone or tablet, saves GameBoy game progress at any time, and even lets you cheat by adding health points, strength, or becoming invincible. Share your GameBoy game progress with friends, then let them continue where you've left off. VGBA lets you play GameBoy Advance games with generic Bluetooth joysticks, Xperia gaming buttons, Moga gamepads, iCade joysticks, and Sixaxis controllers. Other features:* Specifically optimized for Android devices, using assembly language and hardware acceleration to run GBA games as fast as possible.* Supports full screen landscape and portrait modes, with many special effect options.* The built-in Cheatopedia offers cheat codes for dozens of popular GameBoy Advance games.* Save GBA game play at any point and go back to that point once your character gets killed.* Share your current GBA game progress with other users via State Exchange feature.* Supports real time clock, rumble, and tilt features found in GameBoy Advance games.* You do not need GBA BIOS file: VGBA emulates BIOS internally.* Play with your hardware keyboard, gamepad, touch screen, or accelerometer.* Xperia Play special buttons, generic gamepads, MOGA gamepads, iCade joysticks, and Sixaxis gamepads supported.VGBA package itself does not contain any games. You should place your own game files onto the SD card before running VGBA. Notice that VGBA will not play Classic GameBoy games: you will need VGB for that. Please, do not run any software you do not own with VGBA. The author cannot and will not tell you where to find free GameBoy Advance games.Please, report any encountered problems here:http://groups.google.com/group/emul8

reviews.title: Great app, but one thing
reviews.comment: Is there any way to completely remove latency? \'Cause I\'ve been playing mega man battle network, and the latency causes the percussion to be delayed compared to the music.

reviews.title: The best gba app EVER!
reviews.comment: Everything works fine for me. I use a LG Optimus.If all possible, can you look for more cheats in LoZ the Minish cap? I need a cheat to have all kinstones that currently isn\'t on the cheat thing.Thank you once again for your service and awesome emulator man.   Allen~~
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cannot use offline.
reviews.comment: I recently went on a road trip and was extremely disappointed to find out that I wasn\'t able to use this app without a WiFi or cellular connection. I suppose most people don\'t mind but all I have is a Xoom WiFi. Will consider switching to a competing app.

reviews.title: Question
reviews.comment: How do I speed it up?
reviews.author: Max Wilson

reviews.title: Online/link-up/multi-player play?
reviews.comment: That was helpful thanks. Just complicated to figure out without help.   Is there any way to link-up with others thru bluetooth or with your charger from phone/tablet to computer/Ect. to trade or battle people you know with the same app? How about  moving your saved game files from your computer over to your phone/Ect. The online feature is the most important feature of the GBA, but this is still a good emulator app overall. Just missing a few things and the most important thing to have.
reviews.author: Rob Far

reviews.title: Best app on my phone
reviews.comment: I want to leave it 5 stars because without this app i would be very bored sometimes. Butit always says cant verify my license with is very annoying and i have to uninstall and reinstall it at least 3 times a week. Can i get some help. Because obviously ive paid for it. Besides that. This is the best app on my phone
